title: Obscuritas (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "setup_obscuritas_2.0.0.2.exe"
- Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

Title: OBSCURITAS
Genre: Adventure - FPP - Horror
Works on: Windows (Vista, 7, 8, 10)
Languages: Audio and text: Deutsch, English, franÃ§ais. Text only: italiano
Features: single-player
Released: March 18, 2016
Size: 4.2 GB
Company: VIS Games / Ravenscourt
Store page: https://www.gog.com/game/obscuritas

About:
When Sarah inherits her great-uncle's old country home, she has no idea about the dark secret she has stumbled upon and into what obscure world it will take her to. Help Sarah solve the mystery and escape the malicious clutches of the old mansion. Fear is a constant companion on your journey. No matter the dark shadows lurking behind every corner, creeping beasts or demons from another dimension: You have to face your greatest fears to defeat the darkness.
Creeping shadows, huge spiders or terrifying monsters that are coming for you: Experience your personal nightmare through the game's â€œfear recognition mechanicâ€
While fighting your way through this nightmare you'll have to solve various riddles to get to the root of this evil and defeat it
Face your Fears in 3 different chapters with a total of 29 sequences
Experience thrilling graphics set in an atmospheric environment which will turn your blood cold

Minimum system requirements - Windows: Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 (32/64Bit)
CPU: AMD/Intel with 2,8 Ghz
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 or comparable ATI graphics card
Memory: 4GB RAM (min. 2GB free memory for the game)
DirectX 9.0c
8 GB free hard drive space
DirectX compatible sound card
Mouse, Keyboard

Recommended system requirements - Windows: Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 (64Bit)
Processor: AMD/Intel with 3.4 Ghz 
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 790 or comparable ATI graphics card Memory: 8GB (min. 4GB free memory for the game)
DirectX 10
8 GB free hard drive space 
DirectX compatible sound card
Mouse, Keyboard
